describe: Vietnam is a Southeast Asian country known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and stunning landscapes. It features bustling cities, serene countryside, and beautiful coastlines.

cities.name: üèô Hanoi
cities.geographical_location: Located in the northern part of Vietnam, Hanoi is the capital city.
cities.climate: Hanoi has a humid subtropical climate with hot, humid summers and mild winters.

cities.name: üèô Ho Chi Minh City
cities.geographical_location: Situated in the southern part of Vietnam, it is the largest city in the country.
cities.climate: Ho Chi Minh City has a tropical climate with a wet and dry season.
cities.famous_cuisine: Banh Xeo, Com Tam, Goi Cuon

cities.name: üèù Da Nang
cities.geographical_location: Located on the central coast of Vietnam, Da Nang is known for its sandy beaches.
cities.climate: Da Nang has a tropical monsoon climate with a dry season and a rainy season.
cities.famous_cuisine: Mi Quang, Bun Thit Nuong, Banh Xeo

cities.name: üèù Hoi An
cities.geographical_location: A coastal city in central Vietnam, known for its well-preserved Ancient Town.
cities.climate: Hoi An has a tropical climate with a distinct rainy season.
cities.famous_cuisine: Cao Lau, White Rose Dumplings, Banh Bao Vac
